meanings.definition: A feeling of great surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: Her face showed amazement when she saw the magician perform his tricks.
meanings.sent2: The children watched the fireworks display with amazement in their eyes.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's amazement at seeing a squirrel for the first time was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The sheer amazement of witnessing a shooting star left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The amazement of discovering a hidden treasure was a moment they would never forget.

meanings.sent1: His amazement at winning the race was evident from his wide smile.
meanings.sent2: The audience was in complete amazement at the acrobat's daring performance.
meanings.sent3: The amazement of finding a four-leaf clover made her day even better.
meanings.sent4: The amazement of a caterpillar turning into a butterfly is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The child's amazement at seeing a rainbow for the first time was pure joy.
